mapper.select: select s.name as goodsName,p.FILE_URL as imageFile,s.goods_id from prod_goods_group t, prod_goods_group_rel r,prod_goods s,prod_file p where r.group_id = t.group_id and r.goods_id = s.goods_id and p.TARGET_TYPE = 1 and p.SUB_TYPE = 3 and r.goods_id = p.TARGET_ID and t.group_id = #{groupId}

select t.* from prod_goods_group t where 1=1
and upper(t.group_name) like upper(CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{req.groupName}), '%'))
and upper(t.group_code) like upper(CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{req.groupCode }), '%'))
order by create_time desc
